To let users send a broadcast email when an incident occurs, enable broadcast emails, manage or create a contact list view, or let your users send a broadcast email to case or product contacts related to the incident.

Enable Broadcast Emails
Enable broadcast emails to let users send an email with critical information to impacted customers.
